Package server

Class Summary
ClientHandle ClientHandle Thread is the thread handles messages coming from a corresponding client.
ConnectionHandle This ConnectionHandle Class listens for new connections and if new connection request comes from a client,
new ClientHandle Thread is created and it is added to cliendHandleVector

This ConnectionHandle Class constructor
- sets references to MessengerServer's clientHandleVector, clientListVector, serverSocket

Connected clients' information are stored in this class's clientListVector:Vector
Connected clients' handler threads are stored inside clientHandleVector:Vector
Server Socket of the corresponding client is in serverSocketRef
MessengerServer This MessengerServer Class constructor
- creates server sockets
- creates a new thread, named ConnectionThread, to listen for new connections.
ServerMonitorJFrame ServerMonitorJFrame is a monitoring frame to display server & client info
